resources.string: Hentoid is a Doujinshi\n& H-Manga archiving app.
Got Marshmallows?\nWe need to ask you for permission to device storage.

Hentoid supports:
Nhentai, Hitomi, Tsumino, Hentai Cafe, ASM Hentai (manga & comics) and Pururin
& archived content from
FAKKU and Pururin.
Hentoid requires a dedicated folder for storing your media.
Do you have an existing library?\nMake sure to set that as your storage folder.
Choose a storage location for your downloads.
Custom\nSave to a custom storage location
